last_episode_to_air.name: The Revel
last_episode_to_air.overview: John-Boy comes back home after he hits upon hard times when he is in New York pursuing his writing career.  The Baldwin sisters send out invitations for the lavish ball and the invitations are returned.  The Waltons save the day for the Baldwins.

name: The Waltons
overview: The Waltons live their life in a rural Virginia community during the Great Depression and World War II.
tagline: The Landmark Series That Celebrates Family.

episodes.name: The Foundling
episodes.overview: When a young girl is left on the doorstep of the Walton's home, they take her in. Not Before learning she is deaf after taking her to the doctor. One night while the Walton family listen to the radio John boy takes matters into his own hands when Holly (the deaf girl) runs up to her room crying. He teaches her sign language...or really Sign spelling! This new skill comes in handy when the youngest of the Walton family gets locked by accident in a box in the Haunted House, which later turns out to be the house of which Holly lives!

episodes.name: The Carnival
episodes.overview: A Carnival troupe comes to Walton's Mountain. When the manager absconds with the money, four members are stranded at the Walton house. They thank the Waltons with a private performance.

episodes.name: The Calf
episodes.overview: The Family cow, Chance gives birth to a healthy calf but John announces that it must be sold to make ends meet. Elizabeth and Jim Bob hide the Calf to save it. John relents and the family keeps the calf.

episodes.name: The Hunt
episodes.overview: John Boy prepares to go on his first hunt and distress over taking an animals life. During the hunt he saves John's life from an attacking bear. Meanwhile Mary Ellen debates over a new dress or a baseball mitt.

episodes.name: The Typewriter
episodes.overview: John Boy borrows an antique typewriter from the Baldwin sisters so he can send a story to a magazine. Mary Ellen mistakenly sells it to a junk man, but through diligence, gets it back for her brother.

episodes.name: The Star
episodes.overview: When a meteorite falls on the Baldwin's house, Zeb believes his time has come. The Baldwin sisters are hoaxed by their cousin until Zeb and John come to the rescue.

episodes.name: The Sinner
episodes.overview: The Reverend Matthew Fordwick comes to Walton's Mountain and upsets the family with his strict and forceful preaching. He innocently samples "the recipe," and John helps him to be accepted within the community

episodes.name: The Boy From the C.C.C.
episodes.overview: Gino, a boy from the slums of New York City runs away from a CCC Camp and learns about trust and love from the Waltons

episodes.name: The Ceremony
episodes.overview: A Jewish family, escaping refugees from Nazi Germany, come to Waltons Mountain for safety. Their 13 year old son loses respect for his father in the sons attempt to maintain his religious beliefs and practices.

episodes.name: The Legend
episodes.overview: John's old army buddy, Tip Harrison, tries to cover his lack of success with childish actions and comments culminating in an accidental fire and the shooting of reckless the family dog.

episodes.name: The Literary Man
episodes.overview: John-Boy's truck breaks down and he meets the author, A.J. Covington. John-Boy jeopardizes a timber contract badly needed by the family.

episodes.name: The Dust Bowl Cousins
episodes.overview: The Walton's distant cousins arrive on the mountain and immediately upset everyone's life by their shiftless dishonest ways.

episodes.name: The Reunion
episodes.overview: The Baldwin sisters and The Recipe play a pivotal role in this story involving their unscrupulous scheming cousin, Homer Lee Baldwin.

episodes.name: The Minstrel
episodes.overview: Mary Ellen meets a traveling troubadour, Jamie and neglects her responsibilities of helping pick fruit.

episodes.name: The Actress
episodes.overview: When her car breaks down, the famous extravagant actress, Alvira Drummond finds herself stranded on Waltons Mountain. The Children, especially Mary Ellen, are fascinated by her "Hollywood" ways.

episodes.name: The Fire
episodes.overview: A young girls father objects to Miss Hunter's teaching Evolution. During a drunken rage he burns down the school and is killed in the fire.

episodes.name: The Love Story
episodes.overview: John Boy falls in love with Jenny Pendleton who returns to Walton's Mountain. Jenny's father and new step-mother follow her to the mountain. Her father is killed in an auto accident and Jenny returns home with her step mother. John-Boy suffers his first lost love.

episodes.name: The Courtship
episodes.overview: Olivia's uncle Cody Nelson comes to visit with the Waltons and finds love with a woman who has been divorced four times.

episodes.name: The Gypsies
episodes.overview: A gypsy family is stranded, but the leader refuses to accept help from the Waltons. His pride almost costs the life of his baby son.

episodes.name: The Deed
episodes.overview: It seems that the Waltons never officially registered the deed to Waltons Mountain. In order to help pay the legal fees, John-Boy leaves home for a job in the city. He meets new friends, gets mugged and earns a reward to help the family keep their home.

episodes.name: The Scholar
episodes.overview: A neighbor lady, Verdie Grant asks John-Boy to teach her to read and write. He agrees to teach her as he helps Elizabeth. Things go wrong, however, and feelings get hurt.

episodes.name: The Bicycle
episodes.overview: Local blacksmith, Curtis Norton has John-Boy write letters to his bride-to-be. When she arrives on Walton's Mountain, life and Curtis are much different than she expected. Meanwhile, Olivia is feeling new pangs for freedom and something "different" in her life.

episodes.name: The Townie
episodes.overview: John-Boy's friend Sarah sees him as a way to escape her "trapped" life with her demanding mother. When John-Boy rejects her advances, she runs off and plans to elope with a townie.

episodes.name: An Easter Story (1)
episodes.overview: The entire family suffers a crisis when Olivia is stricken with polio. Dr Vance prescribes the accepted treatment, but Olivia does not get better. John-Boy learns of a new treatment practiced by sister Kenny and the family tries it to success in time for the Easter service.

episodes.name: An Easter Story (2)
episodes.overview: The entire family suffers a crisis when Olivia is stricken with polio. Dr Vance prescribes the accepted treatment, but Olivia does not get better. John-Boy learns of a new treatment practiced by sister Kenny and the family tries it to success in time for the Easter service.

episodes.name: The Journey
episodes.overview: Maggie McKenzie would like to see the ocean once more. John-Boy takes her but must miss an important dance. Grandpa helps the children save an injured bird. Earl Hamner makes his only appearance in the series as Maggie's husband. The director of this episode, Harry Harris, who would eventually direct almost 50 episodes, was nominated for an Emmy award.

episodes.name: The Odyssey
episodes.overview: John-Boy heads for a mountain retreat and finds an old school mate who is expecting.The baby arrives with John-Boy's help. The mule, Blue makes his first appearance in this episode.

episodes.name: The Separation
episodes.overview: The family struggles with financial crisis and the electricity is turned off. Grandpa sets out to raise some money but tells no one about his plans. Grandma becomes angry and Grandpa moves out. The bill is paid and the angry grandparents make-up at a barn dance.

episodes.name: The Theft
episodes.overview: A wealthy widow, Mrs Clayborne, accuses John Walton of stealing antiques while working in her mansion. John needed new tires and he hocks his wedding ring to buy them. He refuses to tell anyone where the money came from. The mystery is finally solved when the Clayborne son admits to selling the goblets to raise money for his family.

episodes.name: The Roots
episodes.overview: Harley Foster and his son Jodie are introduced to the series. Harley roams the countryside doing odd jobs. Jodie has had no formal education. Verdie Grant takes a strong liking to Harley and eventually persuades him to stay on Walton's Mountain.

episodes.name: The Chicken Thief
episodes.overview: John-Boy accidentally sees a family friend, Yancy Tucker, stealing chickens and must decide whether to turn him in to the sheriff.  Yancy has been helping poor friends but is arrested and charged with shooting the chicken's owner.  All is resolved when the owner admits to falling and shooting himself.

episodes.name: The Prize
episodes.overview: The Country Fair has come to Walton's Mountain. Grandma has entered a quilt in the competition. Ben sells a pig for the greased pig contest and Olivia's old suitor, now politician, visits the fair.

episodes.name: The Braggart
episodes.overview: Hobart Shank a teen-age orphan returns to the Walton home while John attempts to get him a contract as a professional baseball pitcher. He breaks his arm after falling out of the tree house losing his chance at fame.

episodes.name: The Fawn
episodes.overview: John-Boy secures a position of rent collector for a hated landlord while Erin, who is disappointed by her knight in shining armor, nurses an orphaned fawn back to health.

episodes.name: The Thanksgiving Story (1)
episodes.overview: John-Boy anticipates a visit from his girlfriend and is pending a college scholarship exam. He has an accident in the sawmill and his vision is blurred. He is unable to finish his test and eventually must undergo surgery.

episodes.name: The Thanksgiving Story (2)
episodes.overview: John-Boy anticipates a visit from his girlfriend and is pending a college scholarship exam. He has an accident in the sawmill and his vision is blurred. He is unable to finish his test and eventually must undergo surgery.

episodes.name: The Substitute
episodes.overview: An inexperienced but brilliant young sub teacher wreaks havoc in the Walton's Mountain School. Because of her insecurity, she refuses advice from anyone until Olivia steps in.

episodes.name: The Bequest
episodes.overview: Grandma finds out she has inherited $250 and decides to share her wealth. Mary Ellen   experiments with being a blond and uses Jim-Bob as a test case.

episodes.name: The Air Mail Man
episodes.overview: An air mail pilot, due to engine trouble, lands his plane in the Walton's meadow. With the help of John, the plane is repaired and Olivia receives a surprise birthday gift, a plane ride!

episodes.name: The Triangle
episodes.overview: John-Boy experiences a heart ache because Miss Hunter, his teacher, starts dating Reverend Fordwick.

episodes.name: The Awakening
episodes.overview: Grandma's 68th birthday is here and the 2 faces of age are keenly felt by her as Grandma is confronted by old age. Mary Ellen, now 14 years old, poses an impossible barrier between her and a college student who lays claim to her heart.

episodes.name: The Honeymoon
episodes.overview: Olivia and John go on a late honeymoon at Virginia Beach while John-Boy & Marcia Woolery try to come to an understanding in their relationship.

episodes.name: The Heritage
episodes.overview: An investor talks John into selling the mountain as a tour center. John thinks it over but realizes what the home means to the rest of his family and turns the ofter down.

episodes.name: The Gift
episodes.overview: Jason learns one of life's hardest lessons: the death of a close friend. Seth Turner learns he has only one year to live because he has a fatal disease.

episodes.name: The Cradle
episodes.overview: Olivia finds out she is pregnant and the children set out to make her and the baby a variety of presents. Elizabeth is jealous because she thinks because she is the youngest that her Mom will not love her the same way or will never have any more time for her. In the end Olivia loses the baby

episodes.name: The Fulfillment
episodes.overview: The Waltons bring home an 8 year boy named Stevie who is an orphan so he can experience a family setting. Stevie meets Curtis Norton a blacksmith and an immediate bond occurs. Curtis and his wife take in the boy.

episodes.name: The Ghost Story
episodes.overview: The Children get a Ouija board from Ike. Olivia and Grandma have misgivings about the children playing with it and speaking to it's spirits.

episodes.name: The Graduation
episodes.overview: John-Boy gets ready to graduate from high school in a new suit. When the cow dies John-Boy returns the suit and gets his money back and uses the money to buy another cow. John-Boy graduates in Grandpa's old suit.

episodes.name: The Five Foot Shelf
episodes.overview: A traveling salesman named George Reed talks Olivia into buying a 5 foot collection of books called The Harvard Classics. George uses the down payment to buy his daughter a doll.

episodes.name: The Car
episodes.overview: When John-Boy starts college and needs a car to travel to and from college, he makes a deal with Hyder Rudge. John-Boy works at the Rudge home for the car. Hyder hides the auto and refuses to sell to John-Boy because the car belong to Hyder's dead son.

episodes.name: The Conflict (1)
episodes.overview: Aunt Martha Corinnie Walton's home is in danger by the right-of-way for The Blue Ridge Parkway. All of the Walton clan comes to her aid and try and stop the contractor. During a skirmish with the contractor and deputies, John-Boy gets shot.

episodes.name: The Conflict (2)
episodes.overview: Aunt Martha Corinnie Walton's home is in danger by the right-of-way for The Blue Ridge Parkway. All of the Walton clan comes to her aid and try and stop the contractor. During a skirmish with the contractor and deputies, John-Boy gets shot.

episodes.name: The First Day
episodes.overview: During John-Boy's 1st day at Boatwright he encounters a variety of new challenges. Back at the Walton home, Jason feels the need to be the oldest and excel at school like John-Boy. All of the other children object to Jason's attitude

episodes.name: The Thoroughbred
episodes.overview: John-Boy enters Blue the family mule in the annual cross-country   race & tries to win Selena Linville's affections.Grandpa had won that race years before

episodes.name: The Runaway
episodes.overview: Now that John-Boy is at College, Jim Bob feels small and alone. He brings home a guinea pig, a mascot at school. During the night the little creature dies but the rest of the family are too busy with their own activities to spend time with him. Sad and alone after burying it in the woods, Jim Bob runs away.

episodes.name: The Romance
episodes.overview: Olivia enrolls herself in art class at night and her teacher makes romantic advances.Mary Ellen says she wants to be a nurse

episodes.name: The Ring
episodes.overview: Mary Ellen buys a purse.  At home she finds there's a pretty amethyst ring inside which she decides to wear at the dance, but she and Erin keep the finding of the ring a secret.

episodes.name: The System
episodes.overview: Ben learns the hazards of smoking. John-Boy sticks up for a fellow student who violates Boatwright's honor code during a history exam. There were extenuating circumstances

episodes.name: The Spoilers
episodes.overview: A New York family who is dysfunctional moves to Walton's Mountain. They end up causing havoc in the Walton's household and they move back to New York City

episodes.name: The Marathon
episodes.overview: In Scottsville John-Boy enters a dance marathon with Daisy Garner, a total stranger. It starts out fun but quickly becomes a drudgery until Olivia comes to the rescue.

episodes.name: The Book
episodes.overview: John-Boy finds out that a collection of his short stories will be published and Jason secures a job with Bobby Bigelow and the haystack gang

episodes.name: The Job
episodes.overview: John-Boy gets a job reading to a young blind woman. The woman is hostile towards him and the world in general. She goes to Walton's Mountain and realizes she has much more for which to be thankful.

episodes.name: The Departure
episodes.overview: John seeks work in a Norfolk shipyard because he feels that life has passed by him but he soon realizes that the family needs him at home and he really wants to be there.

episodes.name: The Visitor
episodes.overview: Zeb's old friend returns to Walton's Mountain without his wife.   The Walton's learn that she died earlier but he will not acknowledge her passing.

episodes.name: The Birthday
episodes.overview: Grandpa has a heart attack and seems to be unresponsive to treatment. The family try to  cheer him up, and against doctor's orders, move him to a tent outside so he can communicate with nature

episodes.name: The Lie
episodes.overview: Ben goes to Charlottesville to take a young girl to meet her mother and borrows John-Boy's truck without his permission. The truck is involved in a hit and run unknown to Ben.

episodes.name: The Matchmakers
episodes.overview: Corabeth Walton, a cousin of the Waltons, comes for an unannounced extended visit. Ike Godsey is instantly taken with her and they   quickly marry. Erin enters the Jefferson County Sweetheart Contest.

episodes.name: The Beguiled
episodes.overview: John-Boy encounters a sassy but unprincipled girl whose selfish ways cause hard feelings and suspicion toward Danny, Jim Bob's friend.

episodes.name: The Caretakers
episodes.overview: Grandpa and Grandma become angry with the family and move out to care for a friend's house.Everybody soon realizes that their place is back home

episodes.name: The Shivaree
episodes.overview: Wedding plans for the daughter of a friend go awry when the mountain custom of kidnapping the groom get out of hand

episodes.name: The Choice
episodes.overview: John wants to expand the mill and call it Walton and Sons,Jason wants to study music and he tries for a scholarship

episodes.name: The Statue
episodes.overview: Godsey's store has a raffle of a statue and Grandpa wins the statue - a dead ringer that looks like one of Grandpa's girlfriend prior to Grandma. John-Boy writes a story of a failed romance between Miss Emily and Ashley Longworth

episodes.name: The Song
episodes.overview: Sally Ann Harper has eyes for Jason but Ben falls in love with her. Grandpa and John enter a billiard competition at Ike's store

episodes.name: The Woman
episodes.overview: John and Olivia make plans for their 20 th wedding anniversary,   John-Boy falls in love with a older woman and decides to leave    the mountain with her

episodes.name: The Venture
episodes.overview: John decides to expand his business by building a new mill. To meet a deadline for a big order, John works day and night & gets   pneumonia. While he's in the hostipal his friends finish the mill, but he loses the big contract.

episodes.name: The Sermon
episodes.overview: Reverend Fordwick asks John-Boy to deliver the Sunday sermon, and Miss Hunter asks Olivia to act as the substitute teacher. It proves to be an interesting experience for both as Reverend Fordwick and Miss Hunter plan their wedding and honeymoon

episodes.name: The Genius
episodes.overview: John-Boy's Dean asks him to take care of a 16 year old genius college student for the weekend. It seems that Lyle is wonderful with science and math, but woefully lacking when it comes to dealing with people.

episodes.name: The Fighter
episodes.overview: Young prize fighter James Travis Clark from Richmond arrives on Walton's Mountain looking for work. He lives in the Walton's barn while training for his next fight. Grandma and Olivia are upset with the whole idea until they find out that James is a minister.

episodes.name: The Prophecy
episodes.overview: Father and son struggle with personal crisis: John approaches his 25-year high school reunion regretting he is not a greater success; and John-Boy fears he will never be able to make a living as a writer.

episodes.name: The Boondoggle
episodes.overview: Porter Sims, a reporter from New York, comes to get material for a guide book on Virginia. John-Boy takes him to see the Baldwin sisters who allow him to look through the late Judge Baldwin's private papers. These reveal that their father was accused of treason for harboring Yankee soldiers during the Civil War. Deeply shocked and hurt, they decide not to leave their house ever again.

episodes.name: The Breakdown
episodes.overview: Jason is attending Klineberg Conservatory while playing with the Haystack Gang & the Sunrise Gospeleers. He is not doing too well   and decides to slow down. John-Boy takes a new job in Boatwright's library.

episodes.name: The Wing-Walker
episodes.overview: John-Boy is doing a story on a female wing-walker who is performing at the local fair. He invites her to stay at the Walton home. Jim Bob is soon madley in love with the flyer. Maude Gormley gives Mytrle the goat to the Waltons.

episodes.name: The Competition
episodes.overview: A handsome forestry student name Chad Marshall arrives on Walton's Mountain. Both Erin and Mary Ellen are smitten and a competition delelops between them. Each is sure that she is the chosen one. Mary Ellen realizes that it is Erin thats truly in love.

episodes.name: The Emergence
episodes.overview: John-Boy's old girlfriend Marica Woolery returns to Walton's Mountain with her fiance to sell some inherited property. She plans to invest the money in her fiance's proposed business. John-Boy exposes the fiance as a braggart and not in love with Marcia.   Olivia subs. A student obtain a pair of much needed eye glasses.

episodes.name: The Loss
episodes.overview: Olivia Hill, Olivia's young cousin, returns to Walton's  Mountain to grieve the sudden death of her husband. The family attempts to cheer her up. It does not work until Elizabeth's cat, Calico, gives birth to kittens.

episodes.name: The Abdication
episodes.overview: John-Boy renews his friendship with A.J. Covington who is working with a movie company. The Walton family intently follows  the abdication of King Edward while following the activities of  a movie company fliming on Walton's Mountain.

episodes.name: The Estrangement
episodes.overview: Vera Walton has left her husband Wade and moves into the Walton home. Wade has been abusive and is running moonshine. John gives Wade a job at the mill to help the young couple get on their feet and get back together.

episodes.name: The Nurse
episodes.overview: As Mary Ellen nervously awaites word on her acceptance to nursing school, the rest of the Waltons prepares surprise good-bye gifts.   Mary Ellen is accepted, but she needs more work in math and science and ends up studying with John-Boy and Miss Nora Taylor, the county nurse.

episodes.name: The Intruders
episodes.overview: Ben gets angry and leaves home at the same time Grandpa and John enter a competition with another lumber mill for the big contract. Without knowing, Ben goes to work for the other firm. Grandpa devises a clever scheme to get their lumber to market first.

episodes.name: The Search
episodes.overview: Olivia and the two youngest children, Jim-Bob and Elizabeth, go up on Walton's Mountain and become lost. They experience many challenges. Jim-Bob saves the day using woodsman skills taught to him by Grandpa.

episodes.name: The Secret
episodes.overview: Jim-Bob thinks he was adopted. He searchs his birth records and finds out he's a twin. Jim-Bob's twin brother died at birth.

episodes.name: The Fox
episodes.overview: Grandpa enjoys telling tales of his days with Teddy Roosevelt in the Spanish Amercian War, but he balks about attending a reunion of the Rough Riders. Ben decides to go into to   business trapping and selling animal skins.

episodes.name: The Burn Out (1)
episodes.overview: The Walton's house is nearly destroyed by fire and the children must live temporarily with friends. John-Boy has a difficult time to begin the task of rewriting his lost novel.

episodes.name: The Burn Out (2)
episodes.overview: The Waltons home is repaired.The fire was cause by John-Boy's pipe or by a  fan that was not working

episodes.name: The Big Brother
episodes.overview: John-Boy meets up with a runaway girl named Muffin who's 12 years old. Muffin tells him that she was abused and is trying to   find her mother. John-Boy takes her home and she fools everyone but Grandpa.

episodes.name: The Test
episodes.overview: Olivia gets a job as a dress maker.She does very well & soon she gets full time work.She is pleased with the attention but realizes she wants too be home more than at work .Maude Gormley is put in an old folks home and loses her zest for life

episodes.name: The Quilting
episodes.overview: A quilting is to announce that a woman is of marrying age.  Grandma is determined to have one for her granddaughter Mary Ellen who is just as determined not to participate in what she considers an insulting custom.

episodes.name: The House
episodes.overview: Esther wants to save an old house from being torn down. Grandpa wants the contract to destroy it for the old wood. They both argue until Zeb realizes that house holds sentimental memories for grandma.

episodes.name: The Fledgling
episodes.overview: John-Boy sure trys to raise the down payment for an old printing   press to publish his own newspaper

episodes.name: The Collision
episodes.overview: Selena Linville comes back to Walton's Mountain & lights a  fire   under John-Boy to go to Spain & write all about Rebel cause

episodes.name: The First Edition
episodes.overview: The first edition of The Blue Ridge Chronicle is published by John-Boy. He publishes a story about Ben and it makes his mother mad.

episodes.name: The Vigil
episodes.overview: Mary Ellen, aspring nurse, makes a diagnosis about Grandma's illness which almost costs Grandma her life.

episodes.name: The Comeback
episodes.overview: Jason gets news that his scholarship has been cancelled. Jason begins to hang out at the Dew Drop Inn.  He is trying to interest   Red Turner, a musician, into making a come back since his son's death.

episodes.name: The Baptism
episodes.overview: John refuses to visit the tent meeting or get baptised, even with the presence of a famous evangelist.

episodes.name: The Fire Storm
episodes.overview: John-Boy tries to keep the community updated about the news in Europe sohe decides to print excerpts about Hitler's Mein Kampf  in   his paper. A great outcry ensues and the town is torn apart over the issue of publishing unfavorable items in the Blue Ridge Chronicle.

episodes.name: The Nightwalker
episodes.overview: A unknown person prowls through the night on Walton's Mountain.   Godsey's Hall is open up by Ike Godsey & Jason decides to have a   dance for the community

episodes.name: The Wedding (1)
episodes.overview: Mary Ellen surprises her parents saying that she and Dr. David Spencer are getting married. At the same time the family makes    preparations, Dr. Curt Willard arrives and complicates matters.

episodes.name: The Wedding (2)
episodes.overview: Marry Ellen does not marry DR Spencer

episodes.name: The Cloudburst
episodes.overview: John-Boy sells his Meadow to a mining company to meet payments on his printing press. Ike and Corabeth follow suit. What everybody doesn't know is that the company plans to strip mine which will ruin the land.

episodes.name: The Great Motorcycle Race
episodes.overview: Jim-Bob fixes up Ike's old motorcyle & he enters a motorcyle race. The Godsey's want to adopt a baby but instead adopt a young girl named Aimee

episodes.name: The Pony Cart
episodes.overview: Auntie Martha Corrine Walton comes to Walton's Mountain to visit and soon interupts everybody's life. She and Ben make an old fashioned pony cart and she comes to the realization that she is about to die.

episodes.name: The Best Christmas
episodes.overview: The 11 members of the Walton family are together for Christmas   This would be the last time that all of the Waltons would be together

episodes.name: The Last Mustang
episodes.overview: The Waltons are emersed in a controversial election for sheriff and Grandpa fights to release a wild mustang that he says was caught on Walton property.

episodes.name: The Rebellion
episodes.overview: Corabeth gives Olivia a permanent that turns out badly.   Grandma is up against a new competition for playing the church organ.

episodes.name: The Ferris Wheel
episodes.overview: Elizabeth has nightmares of an unknown experience of being stuck on the very top of a ferris wheel. Ben starts to seriously worry   about his height.

episodes.name: The Elopement
episodes.overview: Erin's 1st love, Chad Marshall, comes back and asks Erin to be his wife. She agrees but John emphatically says no so Erin and Chad run off to elope.

episodes.name: John's Crossroad
episodes.overview: John goes to Charlottesville and applies for an office job. He finds it impossible to work under the harsh direction of the office   manager.

episodes.name: The Career Girl
episodes.overview: Erin's graduation from high school seems to be very painful because Erin has no firm plans for the future or any career.

episodes.name: The Hero
episodes.overview: John-Boy acts on a suggestion of Grandma's and oranizes a memorial to the Jefferson County Doughboys of WWI. Sheriff Ed Bridges , the decorated hero, shows little interest.

episodes.name: The Inferno
episodes.overview: John-Boy goes to Lakehurst New Jersey to travel to cover the landing of Hindenburg and is deeply affected by its crash. Curt tries to figure out how to have more private time with Mary Ellen.

episodes.name: The Heartbreaker
episodes.overview: Jason falls in love with Vanessa, Curt's sister, who left her husband so she could become a singer. John-Boy begins to publish sections of his novel in the newspaper.

episodes.name: The Long Night
episodes.overview: Grandpa says he going to bring Grandma home from the hosptal. When the Doctors say no, Grandpa causes a scene and is told not to come back. Aimee Godsey asks Zeb to be her Grandpa.

episodes.name: The Hiding Place
episodes.overview: The Baldwin's niece, Hillary Von Kleist, comes for a visit  from Vienna. Jason joins the National Guard over Olivia's objections.

episodes.name: The Go-Getter
episodes.overview: A hot headed Ben has a falling out with John and Ben takes a job as a used car salesman . Ben seems a natural until the family questions some of his sales techniques.

episodes.name: The Achievement
episodes.overview: John-Boy goes to New York City after waiting weeks without word on his novel. It pays off and John-Boy talks to an editor who agrees to publish his novel.   John-Boy comes back home and tells them the good news. He also tells the family he is moving to New York City.

episodes.name: The Hawk
episodes.overview: A young minister comes and causes some uneasiness within  the   congregation

episodes.name: The Stray
episodes.overview: Strange foorprints & a stringer of catfish lead the Waltons  to find 12 year old Josh a runaway in the barn hiding.He attaches   himself to John immediately

episodes.name: The Recluse
episodes.overview: Jason and Fern Lockwood,a recluse who shares his love of music   but she is timid and finds life threatening . Ben goes to Norfolk   and looks for work and comes back home to help an overworked father

episodes.name: The Warrior
episodes.overview: An old man, his grandson,and two Indians come to Walton's Mountain saying there are sacred burial grounds where the barn is built.

episodes.name: The Seashore
episodes.overview: The Waltons have an encounter with a strange English girl while on a small vacation at the Baldwin sister's beach cottage. Ben stays home alone expecting to live the life of a carefree bachelor.

episodes.name: The Volunteer
episodes.overview: After Erin says no to the marriage proposal of G.W. Haines, he joins the Army. Erin visits G.W. at Camp Lee Army Base despite her father's reluctance.

episodes.name: The Grandchild (1)
episodes.overview: Mary Ellen Gives birth to the Waltons 1 st grandchild a boy name John Curtis Williard

episodes.name: The Grandchild (2)
episodes.overview: The Waltons are happy to have John Curtis back with  the family

episodes.name: The First Casualty
episodes.overview: Dr. Willard has been drafted to serve for the US Med Corps. Erin's boyfriend G.W. Haines is killed in a training accident and Yancy   Tucker announces that he is joining. They turn him down because of his flat feet.

episodes.name: The Battle of Drucilla's Pond
episodes.overview: At Drucilla's pond, the Army practices maneuvers. Olivia paints quiet scenes wchi she enters in a local art show. They are bought by a mysterious admirer.

episodes.name: The Flight
episodes.overview: This new boy that Jim-Bpb meets says he is going to join the  Air   Corps.Elizabeth adopts Maud Gormley as a sub grandma only until    her real grandma comes back home

episodes.name: The Milestone
episodes.overview: Olivia goes to Alberene her home town to see her Aunt Kate. Olivia copping with going through the change  of life.Jim-Bob fakes his Mom's signature on a job application

episodes.name: The Children's Carol (part 1)
episodes.overview: Two British children escape the London Blitz to find safety in Walton's Mountain with the Baldwins and the Waltons for Christmas. Meanwhile, Jason contemplates whether he can fight in the impending war, and Olivia has a faith crisis as she can't understand how God could allow war.

episodes.name: The Children's Carol (part 2)
episodes.overview: Two British children escape the London Blitz to find safety in Walton's Mountain with the Baldwins and the Waltons for Christmas. Meanwhile, Jason contemplates whether he can fight in the impending war, and Olivia has a faith crisis as she can't understand how God could allow war.

episodes.name: The Celebration
episodes.overview: John finds out that the family is almost out of debt so everybody pitches in on a big contract. During the mortgage burning party, Ike Godsey says that the bank will forclosing on the store. Olivia and John come to the rescue.

episodes.name: The Rumor
episodes.overview: A new family, the Brimmer's, move to the Mountain and look for work and a place to live. Some people from the town are suspicious of their German accent and John helps them.

episodes.name: Spring Fever
episodes.overview: A rose bush owed by Mamie Baldwin is dying and she views that as a sign of her own impending death. Jim-Bob dates Ben's girlfriend and Ben dates Jim-Bob's girlfriend. They come to blows because they are jealous.

episodes.name: The Festival
episodes.overview: Jason gets a lesson in prejudice when he and Josh Verdie's son audition for a recital. Aimee Godsey and Elizabeth experience Spring  Fever.

episodes.name: The Anniversary
episodes.overview: John and Olivia have been married 25 years. Olivia buys John a phone to put in the house and John builds a gazebo for Olivia on top of the mountain. Mary Ellen and Curt have problems being apart from each other.

episodes.name: The Family Tree
episodes.overview: With Jason's help, Verdie searches her roots for the history of her family. Elizabeth corresponds with a soldier who thinks she is 18 years old and looks like Erin.

episodes.name: The Ordeal (1)
episodes.overview: Elizabeth falls from a log pile and she breaks her leg.   Elizabeth can only walk with crutches. Jim-Bob talks her into walking.

episodes.name: The Ordeal (2)
episodes.overview: Elizabeth walks again

episodes.name: The Return (1)
episodes.overview: John-Boy comes back home and helps with reopening the old Guthrie Mine. John and some other men work in the mine. Without warning, the fault gives way to its weaknesses and traps the men under tons of dirt and rock.

episodes.name: The Return (2)
episodes.overview: John and the other men escapes.

episodes.name: The Revelation
episodes.overview: John-Boy asks Daisy to marry him so both return home and make arrangements .John talks to Daisy's mom and learns Daisy has a 3  yr old daughter.

episodes.name: Grandma Comes Home
episodes.overview: The Waltons are happy to finally have Grandma back home with them   This was also sad for all of the Walton clan as it was the last show that actor Will Geer (Grandpa) was on.

episodes.name: The Empty Nest (1)
episodes.overview: Everybody mourns the death of Grandpa Zeb and Flossie Brimmer.  John struggles hard to fill a huge lumber contract and Mary Ellen & Erin move to Charlottesville and they get an apartment.

episodes.name: The Empty Nest (2)
episodes.overview: 2nd part The Waltons and the rest of the townspeople think of Grandpa and Flossie Brimmer.

episodes.name: The Calling
episodes.overview: Jim-Bob meets the Baldwin's cousin, a young girl who is in a convent preparing to become a nun.  Ben hires a mill hand who turns out to be an alcoholic.

episodes.name: The Moonshiner
episodes.overview: Boone Walton comes back to Walton's mountain and gets in trouble with the law. Boone gets released in Jason's custody. Daisy Garner also comes back to Walton's Mountain to visit.

episodes.name: The Obsession
episodes.overview: Mary Ellen gets prescription drugs and abuses them in order to study long hours for her Nurse's exam.  Cissy Tucker Yancy Tucker's wife has had enough and she puts her foot down.

episodes.name: The Changeling
episodes.overview: Just before Elizabeth's 13th birthday, she becomes reluctant to grow up and creates a poltergeist. Jason starts a new job as a radio talk show host giving advice to the lovelorn.

episodes.name: The Portrait
episodes.overview: Erin is both attracted and repelled by a brooding artist who is here from Paris. As part of a war-time mural on the wall of an old house the artist asks to paint Erin's portrait.

episodes.name: The Captive
episodes.overview: Jim-Bob tries to teach Elizabeth to drive. Corabeth 's drinking problem becomes severe and Elizabeth has to drive Aimee and Corabeth home.

episodes.name: The Illusion
episodes.overview: Ester Verdie's daughter comes back to Walton's Mountain disillusioned over having a college degree & unable to land a meaningful job.  Erin helps her find a job at J.D. Pickett's plant.

episodes.name: The Beau
episodes.overview: Grandma's  ex-boyfriend comes calling on Grandma much to the horror of Elizabeth.  Jim-Bob persuades Yancy Tucker to make fuel in his still instead of moonshine.

episodes.name: Day of Infamy
episodes.overview: Christmas 1941.  Mary Ellen says she will be going to be with Curt in Hawaii.  News from Pearl Harbor comes and the Waltons are told that Curt is dead.

episodes.name: The Yearning
episodes.overview: Elizabeth falls in love with the minister when he is forced out of the parsonage by a skunk.  Erin is helping the Baldwin sisters write their memoirs and Erin finds a ring that was left by Ashley Longworth.

episodes.name: The Boosters
episodes.overview: Ben talks the townspeople into opening an auto court against John's advice. Yancy Tucker goes into business for himself.

episodes.name: The Conscience
episodes.overview: Jason has second thoughts about joining the military service and considers becoming a Conscientious Objector much to Ben's dismay.  Jim-Bob gets a military tattoo.

episodes.name: The Obstacle
episodes.overview: Mike Paxton, John-Boy's old friend, is confined to a wheel chair and believes there is no hope for the future. Through the help of the family, he comes out of his shell.

episodes.name: The Parting
episodes.overview: John and Olivia are both tired so Olivia suggests a trip, but the vacation does not help Olivia. Olivia sees a doctor and is told she has TB and must go to a sanitarium.

episodes.name: The Burden
episodes.overview: After a car jack slips and falls and Jim-Bob escapes serious injury, Jim-Bob decides to become a minister.

episodes.name: The Pin-Up
episodes.overview: Ben enters a casual picture of Erin in a contest where she wins 1st prize.  She finds herself the center of attention and the official pin-up girl of Camp Lee to John's dismay.

episodes.name: The Attack
episodes.overview: Ike has a heart attack because of the pressures and shortages of war-time shop-keeping. The Walton children pitch in and help keep Ike's store open in his absence.

episodes.name: The Legacy
episodes.overview: Ashley Longworth Jr, who bears striking resemblance to his dad, comes to the Baldwin home and is courted by Miss Emily and Erin.

episodes.name: The Outsider
episodes.overview: Ben comes home in the middle of the night with his new wife Cindy and they set up housekeeping in the shed.  The early years of marriage aren't easy until Grandma steps in.

episodes.name: The Torch
episodes.overview: Cally May, John's ex-girlfriend, comes to Walton's mountain and buys the Dew Drop Inn. John and Olivia's kids try to protect John from Cally May's attention. Ike, Cindy and Elizabeth turn Godsey's hall into a canteen for soldiers from Camp Rockfish.

episodes.name: The Talespin
episodes.overview: Jim-Bob can not join the Air Corps because he fails the eye exam.  Jim-Bob decides to run off and join the Army.

episodes.name: Founders' Day
episodes.overview: Jason tries desperately with his music professor to meet the course's requirements of an original composition. He composes Appalachian Portrait while he plans the piece.

episodes.name: The Home Front (1)
episodes.overview: John serves on the local draft board. A young soldier he drafted has been killed and the boy's Dad threatens John & Jim-Bob. The family receives word that John-Boy is missing in action.

episodes.name: The Home Front (2)
episodes.overview: John serves on the local draft board. A young soldier he drafted has been killed and the boy's Dad threatens John & Jim-Bob. The family receives word that John-Boy is missing in action.

episodes.name: The Kinfolk
episodes.overview: Rose arrives for a visit which is extended with Serena and Jeffery, her grandchildren.  Jim-Bob and Ike Godsey build an air raid siren big enough for Richmond.

episodes.name: The Diploma
episodes.overview: Mary Ellen subs as the county nurse. John tries to prove to the army that he really did graduate from high school. John can not find his diploma so he takes another test.

episodes.name: The Innocents
episodes.overview: Olivia says the mountain needs a day nursery for children of defense plant workers.  Corabeth thinks that Ike has a girlfriend when she sees Rose teaching him to dance.

episodes.name: The Starlet
episodes.overview: The film company comes to Walton's Mountain and Pickett plant is used for a war-time documentary.  Erin is convinced by the director that she has potential in Hollywood.

episodes.name: The Journal
episodes.overview: A publisher asks permission from John and Olivia about printing the new book that John-Boy wrote in Europe.  Jeff does not want Reckless put to sleep after Reckless becomes sick.

episodes.name: The Lost Sheep
episodes.overview: Ashley Longworth Jr. comes back and asks Erin to be his wife.  She has some serious doubts after he says he has lost his faith in God.

episodes.name: The Violated (1)
episodes.overview: Olivia searches for a soldier's wife at the request from the Red Cross. The soldier's wife won't answer her husband's letters.   Corabeth expects an inheritance.

episodes.name: The Waiting (2)
episodes.overview: To be near John-Boy who is in a coma, Olivia joins the Red Cross.  Rose plans the big Thanksgiving dinner. John and Olivia spend Thanksgiving in Richmond Hospital with John-Boy.

episodes.name: The Silver Wings
episodes.overview: Jim-Bob meets Betsy, a married woman and falls in love with her while delivering her a package.

episodes.name: The Wager
episodes.overview: All of Jefferson County watched with wonder when Mary Ellen and Erin decide to venture even farther into a mans world.

episodes.name: The Spirit
episodes.overview: There's an escapee from a POW camp in North Carolina hiding on Walton's Mountain and he is befriended by Jeffrey. They ask him in on Christmas Eve.

episodes.name: The Fastidious Wife
episodes.overview: Cindy gets a book from Corabeth on how to be the perfect wife and Cindy resolves to cater to Ben's every need.  Jeffrey takes home a cat and names her Harold, until the cat gives birth to kittens.

episodes.name: The Unthinkable
episodes.overview: There's a recruit working for Jason's company who is Jewish. He tells how his grandfather was arrested and killed by German soldiers in Warsaw.

episodes.name: The Idol
episodes.overview: Hazel Lamphere, the new school teacher, comes to Walton's Mountain and Elizabeth is immediately attached to her.  Virginia is born to Cindy and Ben.

episodes.name: The Prodigals
episodes.overview: Josh and Jeffrey break  into Godsey's  store and are in trouble with the law.  After being humiliated by a solider in uniform, Ben decides to enlist.

episodes.name: The Remembrance
episodes.overview: Zadoc Walton, Zeb's cousin, arrives to keep a 21 year old promise and makes a surprising contribution to Boatwright University.

episodes.name: The Inspiration
episodes.overview: Mamie Baldwin makes it through a difficult operation with Grandma's help.

episodes.name: The Last Straw
episodes.overview: When John's equipment breaks down and Jim-Bob breaks his, John decides maybe he has had enough. Jeffrey builds himself a soapbox car sponsored by Godsey's store.

episodes.name: The Traveling Man
episodes.overview: Rose's ex-boyfriend Stanley Perkins arrives on Waltons Mountain and he makes a re-acquaintance with Rose.

episodes.name: The Furlough
episodes.overview: John-Boy returns home physically cured but he still suffers from a loss of memory.  Ike gets arrested for draft evasion because he ignores a letter from the Army.

episodes.name: The Medal
episodes.overview: Corabeth gets pursued by an old suitor.  Mary Ellen is attracted to Eddie Ramirez.

episodes.name: The Valediction
episodes.overview: Jim-Bob graduates as class valedictorian and Erin finds out that Ashley Longsworth Jr married a girl in London. The Walton boys join the War.

episodes.name: The Outrage (1)
episodes.overview: Harley Foster and John have a delivery out of town. They have to deal with prejudice first hand when Harley gets arrested for an old crime.  John goes and sees President Roosevelt for a pardon.

episodes.name: The Outrage (2)
episodes.overview: Cont for part 1

episodes.name: The Pledge
episodes.overview: Mary Ellen feels inadequate as a nurse to help Mountain folk.  Against the Dean's advice, Mary Ellen applies for medical school.

episodes.name: The Triumph
episodes.overview: With the war drawing to a close, Jason and a young man in his squad deal with the question of killing.  Ike and Corabeth face problems with the Ration Board.

episodes.name: The Premonition
episodes.overview: Cindy has bad dreams about Ben, who becomes a POW.  John-Boy falls in love with a french girl in Paris who runs a book shop.

episodes.name: The Pursuit
episodes.overview: Jim-Bob's ex-girlfriend comes to Walton's Mountain saying that Jim-Bon is the father of her baby.  In the Pacific, Ben is still a POW.

episodes.name: The Last Ten Days
episodes.overview: Ben is taken on an unexpected trip by his captor who turns Ben in to the American forces.  Toni is seriously courted by Jason.

episodes.name: The Move
episodes.overview: Ben comes home from the war and tells John he wants to study engineering.  The long awaited vacation that Erin plans to go on is interrupted.  John tells the his family he has to take Olivia to Arizona to the sanitarium.

episodes.name: The Whirlwind
episodes.overview: Mary Ellen agrees to marry Jonesey but finds out that Curt might very well be alive.  The Dew Drop Inn is reopened by Jason.

episodes.name: The Tempest
episodes.overview: Mary Ellen finds out that Curt is still alive.  He is living in Florida but is quite the different person from the man she remembers.  J.D. asks Erin to come back to work by begging Erin.

episodes.name: The Carousel
episodes.overview: Cindy's father gets killed and Cindy finds out she is adopted when she goes through some old papers. Cindy goes to find her Mother.  Elizabeth and Drew have problems.

episodes.name: The Hot Rod
episodes.overview: Jim-Bob and Jody get discharged from the service. They celebrate and they decide to open up a garage. The Baldwin sisters get forced to close their recipe machine until they discover their Grandfather's still in a secret room.

episodes.name: The Gold Watch
episodes.overview: Stanley Perkins comes again and eventually says he is suffering from a nervous break down.  Because of a new singer at The Dew Drop Inn that pays too much attention to Toni, Jason has problems. Rose gives Stanley a gold watch.

episodes.name: The Beginning
episodes.overview: Tom Marshall, the new minister, comes to Walton's Mountain and shakes up the congregation. Toni moves into the Baldwin's home and she tells the family she's Jewish. Toni and Jason decide to get married.

episodes.name: The Pearls
episodes.overview: Orma Lee, Corabeth's twin sister, arrives to see Ike when Corabeth is away.  Elizabeth goes to Arizona to see Olivia and John because she feels lonely.

episodes.name: The Victims
episodes.overview: The Waltons help a woman who's husband beats her when he is drunk.  Jim-Bob decides he will make a fortune by investing in war surplus.

episodes.name: The Threshold
episodes.overview: John-Boy comes home to ponder his future and he ends up doing a TV show for Boatwright University.  Rose is given a run for her money by Zuleika Dunbar over the affection of Stanley.

episodes.name: The Indiscretion
episodes.overview: Corabeth finds Ike's old love letters and files for a divorce.  Drew wants to spend a romantic night with Elizabeth.

episodes.name: The Heartache
episodes.overview: Rose cancels her wedding to Stanley because she hides a heart condition. Cindy realizes that she would rather stay home than work in the shop.

episodes.name: The Lumberjack
episodes.overview: A member of a influential family named Paul Matthews Northridge brings mystery & romance to Erin.

episodes.name: The Hostage
episodes.overview: A 14 year old girl is promised marriage in mountain tradition.  Mary Ellen interferes and the bride-groom kidnaps Elizabeth to get his bride back. Octavia, an eccentric cousin of the Baldwins, is treated to a visit by him.

episodes.name: The Revel
episodes.overview: John-Boy comes back home after he hits upon hard times when he is in New York pursuing his writing career.  The Baldwin sisters send out invitations for the lavish ball and the invitations are returned.  The Waltons save the day for the Baldwins.
